alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 3:44PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Pima County through 430 PM MST... At 343 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, or 12 miles northwest of Sahuarita, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tucson, Drexel Heights, South Tucson, Three Points, Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, Valencia West, Tucson Estates, Saguaro National Park West, Tucson International Airport, Picture Rocks, San Xavier Mission and Ryan AirField. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 260 and 263. Interstate 19 between mile markers 52 and 63. Route 86 between mile markers 144 and 171. Route 286 between mile markers 40 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
